name: What A Trash Game!
description: A littering simulator - spreading awareness about plastic waste in waterways through gamification and reverse psychology.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 600 series or equivalent Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 700 series or equivalent Storage: 300 MB available space
